title: Localization key required when adding, otherwise externalized text cannot be displayed in chart
description: Bug 101187: Localization key is required when adding. If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a new chart without specifying a localization key, the externalized text in the chart title is not displayed.
EB: The system should display an error message indicating that a localization key is required when adding a new chart.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Attempt to add a new chart without setting a localization key.
2. Observe that the externalized text in the chart title is not displayed.

To fix the issue:
1. Set a valid localization key when adding a new chart.
